testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 4.2 - Edit a Recipe, happy path

testcase.name: And the current mode of the coffee maker is "WAITING"
testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 4.2 - Edit a Recipe, happy path

testcase.name: And the coffee amount of the "Coffee" recipe is updated appropriately "2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 4.2 - Edit a Recipe, happy path
